cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("GGranula")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../FRUT-master/prefix/FRUT/cmake")
include(Reprojucer)

  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/GGranula.jucer"
)
